title: Saravana Bhavan - Syed Alwi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: International franchise vegetarian restaurant specializing in South Indian cuisine. Features an extensive menu with many varieties of dosas, plus curries and entrees in addition to chaat and sweets. Drinks list has fresh juices, fruit shakes, lassi, tea and coffee. Casual dining.
